dcterms:creator: A. Shahroudy
J. Liu
T. T. Ng
G. Wang
dcterms:description: NTU-60 is one of the widely used indoor-captured datasets for human action recognition. 56880 action clips in total are performed by 40 different actors in 60 action categories. The clips are captured by three cameras simultaneously at different horizontal angles and heights in a lab environment. Experiments are conducted on the Cross-Subject (X-Sub) and Cross-View (X-View) benchmarks.
dcterms:title: NTU RGB+D 60 (NTU-60)

dcterms:creator: J. Liu
A. Shahroudy
M. Perez
G. Wang
L. Y. Duan
A. C. Kot
dcterms:description: NTU-120 is an extended version of NTU-60. There are totally 114480 action clips in 120 action categories. Most settings of NTU-120 follow the NTU-60. Experiments are conducted on the Cross-Subject (X-Sub) and Cross-Setup (X-Set) benchmarks.
dcterms:title: NTU RGB+D 120 (NTU-120)

dcterms:creator: J. Liu
S. Song
C. Liu
Y. Li
Y. Hu
dcterms:description: PKU-MMD contains nearly 20,000 action clips in 51 action categories. Two subsets PKU-MMD I and PKU-MMD II are used in the experiments. PKU-MMD II is more challenging than PKU-MMD I as it has a higher level of noise. Experiments are conducted on the Cross-Subject (X-Sub) benchmark for both subsets.
dcterms:title: PKU-MMD
